project_plan.name: Simple Contact Book in Python
project_plan.description: Implement a command-line interface for a contact book application that allows users to add, search, update, and delete contacts while storing the data in a JSON file.

task.name: Implement feature to add a contact
Implement feature to search for a contact
Implement feature to update an existing contact
Implement feature to delete a contact
Implement functionality to read and write contacts to a JSON file
Write tests for each of the features above
Execute tests on all implemented features to ensure that they function correctly
